name: H-Sil® EM-60 Concentrate
description: H-Sil® EM-60 Concentrate is a 60% active nonionic emulsion of regular viscosity silicone. This product can be used as-is or diluted with water to form a stable emulsion letdown. It is formulated to provide excellent gloss, lubrication, and protection to a variety of surfaces. This product is an excellent ingredient for formulators to use in automotive tire and vinyl dressings, including polishes and waxes for automobiles and other hard surfaces.
